title: TheKinOfTheFreljord (TKTF) CONFIRMING ROLES!! (ANY DIVISION).

ROLES WILL BE CONFIRMED, FIRST TO COMMENT OUT OF THOSE PEOPLE^^

(Not accepting apps anymore soz ;_; UNLESS: Roles are not filled)

replies.body:
Ign: StronD
Age: 18
Role: Top, Jungler or Sup
Main Champ: Maokai, Naut, Gragas, Hecarim, Morg
Division: S2: Silver (BR)  S3: Gold (BR)  S4: Diamont (BR)  S5: Platinum (OCE)
Reasons why you want to join: I like to play competitive games with communication and I really want to improve my english. so, If i play my LOL with English speakers it would be amazing :D ( I used to play in competitive in Brazil, but Im not living there anymore hahaha) ( we were Diamont in 5x5 Ranked team)
Some other stuff like weaknesses: i dont have much experience with top or support roles, but Im playing very well now. So i can learn prety fast and help my team... I used to play as a Jungler.
